fields.name: Tal'dorei Campaign Setting
fields.desc: Critical Role: Tal'Dorei Campaign Setting is a sourcebook that details the continent of Tal'Dorei from the Critical Role campaign setting for the 5th edition of the Dungeons & Dragons fantasy role-playing game. It was published by Green Ronin Publishing and released on August 17, 2017.
fields.author: Matthew Mercer, James Haeck
